name: Garmin Vivomove Luxe
description: Look smart, be smart. Garmin’s vívomove Luxe is a well dressed smartwatch that pairs well with boardrooms and French cuffs, but will still remind you to pick up eggs on the way home. Below its analogue hands lies a sophisticated touchscreen and an optical heart rate monitor that gets pulse information straight off your wrist. Internal accelerometers take cues from your movements to track waking and resting. Paired with a smartphone running Garmin Connect, get smart notifications, weather data, review your calendar, control apps like music players and share data with Garmin’s active online community. You can also monitor stress and use the relaxation timer to bring more calm to your day.Machined stainless steel case and virtually scratchproof, domed sapphire crystal.Lleather or Milanese mesh strap.Analogue hands move out of the way when using the AMOLED display touchscreen.Move IQ intelligently detects an tracks activity, your Garmin Connect timeline ensures you get credit for all of your daily exercise.Preloaded with strength training, elliptical training, stair stepping, yoga, and cardio training activity profiles.Equipped with Garmin’s V3 Elevate™ optical heart rate monitor. Elevate V3 has a red LED to provide Pulse Ox masurements.Broadcast your HR over ANT+ (so other devices can pick it up).VO2 max data to track how efficiently your body uses oxygen.Body Battery™ tracks your daily energy levels, monitoring what drains your energy (exercise) and recharges your energy (rest, food, etc.), you get a better idea of how and when to train.Garmin Pay™ contact-less payment (if supported by your bank).Stress level score monitors heart rate variability while inactive to produce a stress score from 0-100, the lower the score, the lower your stress.  When stress levels are high, the vívomove’s relaxation timer takes you through steps to lower your levels.On board sleep tracking monitors rest, breathing patterns, total sleep hours.Counts flights of stairs with internal barometer data combined with your step data.Weekly intensity minutes are displayed against the ideal of 150 needed to maintain a healthy life.Move bar reminds you to move after being stationary for too long.Connected GPS features leverage your phone’s GPS to track your training, offering speed, distance and pace for running and cycling.Automatically syncs your data to your phone running the free Garmin Connect app.Free Garmin Connect app lets you review activities, receive texts, social media alerts, emails, etc., download training plans, track the weather and more, all via Bluetooth to your phone.Internal memory stores up to 7 timed activities and 2 weeks worth of daily activity. Garmin Connect will store all of your activity data.Rechargeable lithium-ion battery lasts up to 5 days as an activity tracking smartwatch, or 2 weeks in watch only mode.20mm lug width and quick-release straps, makes strap customization easy.Fits wrist sizes 125-190mm.In the box: vívomove Luxe, charging cable, documentation.
